item.title: AI-Integrated Backend Development: Building Intelligent Systems
item.description: AI integration in backend development has become essential, not optional, in 2025. Let’s explore how to build intelligent backend systems using LLM, RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation), and vector databases with practical code examples.
